title: Android callbacks
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
1.5

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
Mac OS  10.11.3

3. What did you do?
(Use play.golang.org to provide a runnable example, if possible.)
Android app with library that written on gomoblie

4. What did you expect to see?
Except to get callback from library to Activity

5. What did you see instead?
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference

Full description here: [http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35767181/gomobile-android-using-callbacks](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/35767181/gomobile-android-using-callbacks)
